name: Incoming: Balls
description:
Made with godot for the Vetelino's summer jam of 2022. Move through the court and kick the balls with the precise tool to get them back. Four strikes and you're out.

CONTROLS:

A / D | left arrow key / right arrow key : move

W / up arrow key / SPACE: jump

I / O/ P | Z / X / C: use your raquet / hockey stick / hands

S / down arrow key: fast fall

CREDITS:

Music: 

* Lobo Loco - Abraxas https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Lobo_Loco/handmade-1/abraxas-id-1734/

Sound Effects:

* Tennis ball: https://freesound.org/people/14GPanskaValaChristoffer/sounds/420174/

* Hockey ball: https://freesound.org/people/Eelke/sounds/266647/

* Voleyball: https://freesound.org/people/16HPanskaResatko_Matej/sounds/497968/
